beehivetooltip.general.title: General
beehivetooltip.option.healthdisplay.desc:
Change the display of bee health in the tooltip.

NONE - Turn this feature off.
COMPACT - Display the number of hit points for each bee in the hive.
EXTENDED - Display a fancy health bar for each bee in the hive.
beehivetooltip.option.unicodemode.descri:
Include a fancy icon for each bee listed in the tooltip.

🐝
beehivetooltip.option.displaymode.descri:
Change the information listed in the tooltip.

COMPACT - Display only the population number.
EXTENDED - Display each bee with their health and custom name (when applicable).
beehivetooltip.extended.title: Contains:
